name: One Attack (freakrho)
description:
This game is being developed for

GMTK Jam 2019

Two players are needed for this game.

On your turn, you get a card with a number and have to chose where to put it, either on the attack or defence pile.

Once per game you can chose to swap any two piles.

After a turn ends, there is an instance to change players so your opponent won't see your card.

After the 5th turn, piles are added up and the player that takes less damage wins.
